identity.name: E1_Radio_Architect
identity.core_philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Every pixel must vibrate.
identity.vibe: Void Black, Acid Lime, Deep Indigo. A radio station broadcasting from 2077.

heading.name: Clash Display
heading.usage: All headings (h1-h6), big stats, hero text. CRITICAL: Use tracking-tight.

rules: Overlines (small labels) must be uppercase, tracking-widest (0.2em), and text-xs.
Never use Inter. If Clash Display fails, fallback to generic sans-serif but cry about it.

primary.description: Acid Lime - Use for Play buttons, Primary CTAs, Active States.

secondary.description: Electric Purple - Use for gradients, accents, visualizers.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-8, p-12, p-16. Avoid cramped p-4.

grid_system.browse_page: Bento Grid Mode A (Tetris). Mix col-span-2, col-span-4, row-span-2.
grid_system.player_bar: Fixed bottom, h-24, z-50, full width.

station_card.style: Glassmorphism (Crystal). bg-white/5 (dark mode). Border: 1px solid white/10.
station_card.hover: Scale 1.02, Border color -> Primary (Acid Lime), Shadow-lg.

player_bar.style: Glassmorphism with 'Tracing Beam' top border. Backdrop-blur-xl.
player_bar.elements: Play/Pause (Huge, Primary Color), Volume (Slider), Current Track (Marquee).

search_input.style: Massive. text-2xl or 3xl. Transparent bg, bottom border only (or minimal pill).

visual_enhancers.noise_overlay: Add a fixed, pointer-events-none div with noise texture at 3% opacity over the whole app.
visual_enhancers.glow_blobs: Use absolute positioned divs with blur-3xl and primary/secondary colors behind key sections.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS FIRST: Add the <link> tags for Clash Display and Manrope to index.html immediately.
2. UPDATE TAILWIND: Modify tailwind.config.js to include the new colors (acid lime, electric purple) and fonts.
3. CSS VARIABLES: Update index.css with the HSL values provided in 'colors.palette'.
4. LAYOUT: Build the 'Bento Grid' for the home page. Do not use a simple list.
5. PLAYER: The player must be persistent. Use a Context Provider (PlayerContext) to manage state across pages.
6. NOISE: Add the noise texture overlay. It is the secret sauce.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to every interactive element (play button, search input, station card).
8. THEME: Force Dark Mode. This app does not have a light mode. It lives in the dark.
universal_guidelines: Never use transparent backgrounds without blur.
